content:
"Star Trek: Discovery" is a fantastic show! As of now, "Star Trek: Discovery" is exclusively available on CBS All Access (in the United States). Unfortunately, it's not currently available on Disney+, Netflix, or Amazon Prime Video.

If you want to watch "Star Trek: Discovery," you'll need to subscribe to CBS All Access. The good news is that they offer a free trial period, so you can try it out and see if you like it before committing to a subscription.

Here are the current pricing options for CBS All Access:

* Limited Commercials: $5.99/month or $59.99/year
* Commercial-Free: $9.99/month or $99.99/year

Keep in mind that CBS All Access also offers a wide range of other content, including other Star Trek shows, classic TV series, and original programming.

If you're unsure, you could start with a free trial and binge-watch the first season of "Star Trek: Discovery" to see if it's to your liking. If you enjoy it, you can always continue your subscription.

Let me know if you have any other questions or need further assistance!
